description: This file implements a client for the Confluence API with OAuth2 or API key authentication, including support for retries, pagination, and various endpoint methods such as listing spaces, pages, comments, and creating pages.

classes.name: ConfluenceAuth
classes.description: Handles authentication with Confluence, supporting OAuth2 and API key methods, managing tokens, and headers.

classes.name: ConfluenceClient
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with Confluence's API endpoints including listing spaces, pages, comments, and creating pages, with built-in retry and backoff logic.

methods.name: None set_token(self, token: str, expires_in: Optional[int] = None)
methods.description: Sets the OAuth2 access token and optional expiry time.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] auth_headers(self)
methods.description: Returns the appropriate authorization headers based on the authentication method.

methods.name: None refresh_if_needed(self, client: httpx.AsyncClient)
methods.description: Refreshes the OAuth2 token if it has expired or is about to expire.

methods.name: float _sleep_delay(self, attempt: int)
methods.description: Calculates delay for exponential backoff with jitter.

methods.name: httpx.Response _request(self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, json: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Performs HTTP requests with retries, handling status codes for rate limiting and server errors.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_spaces(self, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Confluence spaces.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_pages(self, space_key: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of pages, optionally filtered by space key.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_comments(self, page_id: str, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves comments for a specific page.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)
methods.description: Creates a new page in a specified space.

methods.name: None __init__( self, base_url: str, method: str, access_token: Optional[str] = None, refresh_token: Optional[str] = None, client_id: Optional[str] = None, client_secret: Optional[str] = None, api_email: Optional[str] = None, api_token: Optional[str] = None, token_endpoint: Optional[str] = None, )
None __init__(self, auth: ConfluenceAuth, timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 4, backoff_factor: float = 0.5)

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.signature: ( self, base_url: str, method: str, access_token: Optional[str] = None, refresh_token: Optional[str] = None, client_id: Optional[str] = None, client_secret: Optional[str] = None, api_email: Optional[str] = None, api_token: Optional[str] = None, token_endpoint: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, auth: ConfluenceAuth, timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 4, backof/
ctags.signature: (self, auth: ConfluenceAuth, timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 4, backoff_factor: float = 0.5)

ctags.name: _request
ctags.pattern: /^    async def _request(self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, js/
ctags.signature: (self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, json: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)

ctags.name: create_page
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)

ctags.name: list_comments
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list_comments(self, page_id: str, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None) -/
ctags.signature: (self, page_id: str, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: list_pages
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list_pages(self, space_key: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optiona/
ctags.signature: (self, space_key: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: list_spaces
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list_spaces(self, limit: int = 50, cursor: Optional[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]/

ctags.name: refresh_if_needed
ctags.pattern: /^    async def refresh_if_needed(self, client: httpx.AsyncClient) -> None:$/

ctags.name: set_token
ctags.pattern: /^    def set_token(self, token: str, expires_in: Optional[int] = None) -> None:$/
